resources.string: No apps can perform this action.
It is not possible to make calls.

The III International Scientific Conference UCIENCIA of the University of Informatics Sciences (UCI) invite researchers, academics and software developers in the field of informatics and computer science and applications, to participate in the conference scitific activities.

{md-star @color/colorPrimaryDark spin @dimen/_21sdp} To provide opportunities for the exchange of experiences, reflections and results of technical and scientific activity; R + D + i and education in the field of informatics and computer sciences.
{md-star @color/colorPrimaryDark spin @dimen/_21sdp} To display the results of researches developed in these fields.
{md-star @color/colorPrimaryDark spin @dimen/_21sdp} To promote cooperation between national and foreign institutions.
{md-star @color/colorPrimaryDark spin @dimen/_21sdp} VIII International Workshop on Free Software
